inputs.name: sourcePath
inputs.label: Source Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the file(s) containing files to tokenize. Leave empty to use the sources directory. NOTE: this is case sensitive for non-Windows systems. This should be a path containing the file, not the file itself.

inputs.name: filePattern
inputs.label: File Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: File pattern to find in source path. Supports minimatch. NOTE: this is case sensitive for non-Windows systems.

inputs.name: includes
inputs.label: Includes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma-separated list of keys to tokenize. If left empty, all values are tokenized.

inputs.name: excludes
inputs.label: Excludes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma-separated list of keys NOT to tokenize. You should not specify both include and exclude.

inputs.name: nullBehavior
inputs.label: Null Behavior
inputs.helpMarkDown: Action to take when properties are null: write warning or throw error.
